inclusion.criterion: Birth weight greater than or equal to 1500 grams
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Gestational age greater than or equal to 32 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Palpable testis in the left scrotum
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: palpable testis is the left scrotum

inclusion.criterion: Non-palpable testis in the right scrotum
inclusion.label: unknown
met
inclusion.evidence: penis is normal in shape and size

exclusion.criterion: Definitive bowel atresia based on physician diagnosis
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 5 months old male baby boy with a complaint of empty scrotum at the right side. Diagnostic laparoscopy showed an abdominal undescended testis.
